Name: GUN DOG ROCK RAPID
About the game: The Story... The Demon King's army suddenly attacked. The angry sorceress of the Empire unleashed her most powerful monster. 'Gun Dog Rock Rapids' It looks like a white cat, but it seems to be a strong monster. What on earth will happen to it... Make peace with the cat. Character illustration : Emilia Kujyou Use two types of shots to move forward. Kick out the swarming zakos and take on the powerful bosses. 7 crazy worlds are waiting for your cat. 2D side-scrolling, super simple shooter game! Selecting the difficulty level. EAZY: Your allies will help you. Enemies are hard to rank. HARDX: Easy to increase levels and ranks. 2 types of shots. AZ Shot: that concentrates and diffuses forward. BX Shot: with penetrating power in all four directions. Scoring System. The higher the enemy's rank, the more score you get. The higher the rank, the more time bonus you get when you clear the game. If your cat takes damage, your rank will drop. You must aim for a high score. It supports Xinput and DirectInput gamepads, but menu display and shutdown can only be operated with the keyboard. Please delete the recorded replay from Explorer. Please select joystick movement in the controller settings.
